procurement_category: Goods that must be delivered (delivery acceptance method)
description: Replacement of Hydrogen Compressor for Standalone Facilities
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Hydrogen Gas Compressor Acquisition

**Reference Number**: WS4115451968-Doc4117862250
**Solicitation Number**: WS4115451968
**Publication Date**: July 26, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: August 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Amendment Information**
The tender closing date has been amended. Please disregard the original closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on August 31, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT.

**Scope of Work**
CanmetMATERIALS (CMAT) requires a new compressor capable of compressing pure hydrogen gas and/or blends of hydrogen with nitrogen or argon gas to at least 5000 psig. The compressor will be used to charge test cells to study the performance of materials in high-pressure, hydrogen-containing environments, supporting CMAT’s role in delivering on Canada’s Hydrogen Strategy and the national goal to achieve "Net-Zero by 2050."

**Expected Contract Dates**

* Expected Contract Start Date: September 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2024

**Delivery Requirements**
The contractor is required to deliver a certified, operational hydrogen compressor prior to March 31, 2024.

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**
The delivery will take place in Hamilton.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact Mike Littlefield, SPAC/PSPC at mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16988903?extsite=MTY5ODg5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA
